1.text: Stick to a sulfate-free shampoo that’s extra moisturizing.

2.text: Every time you wash your hair, use a medium consistency conditioner.

3.text: Wash with warm, but rinse with cold water.

4.text: Use a microfiber towel to avoid frizz and soak up extra moisture.

5.text: Brushing your hair with a hairbrush can lead to extra frizz.

6.text: This step hydrates your tresses to minimize frizz.

7.text: Use hair serum every day to fight frizz and add extra moisture.

8.text: Give your waves some extra hold so they don’t fall flat.

9.text: Use the air-drying technique when you have a few hours to spare.

10.text: Give your waves extra volume with a diffuser attachment.

11.text: Protect your waves at night to fight frizz throughout the day.

12.text: Use this technique on days that you don’t wash your hair.
